titles: A warning for all desperate vvomen By the example of Alice Dauis who for killing of her husband was burned in Smithfield the 12 of Iuly 1628. to the terror of all the beholders. To the tune of the Ladies fall.
notes: Place of publication and publication year from STC.
Verse -- "Vnto the world to make my moane,".
Reproduction of the original in the Pepys Library.
